title: PBE Alpha
body: why am I still waiting for them to respond to me, I want to play alpha.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you referring to the [PBE (Public Beta Enviorenment)](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) (Which you need either a level 30  NA, EUW or EUNE account for)?

Or do you mean [LCU (League Client Update)](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update)?
PBE and thanks for leaving a comment
